verses.name: 2 Chronicles 23:5
verses.text: And a third part shall be at the king’s house; and a third part at the gate of the foundation: and all the people shall be in the courts of the house of the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 23:6
verses.text: But let none come into the house of the Lord, save the priests, and they that minister of the Levites; they shall go in, for they are holy: but all the people shall keep the watch of the Lord.
